section.title: Release 23.05 (“Stoat”, 2023.05/??)
section.para: Support is planned until the end of December 2023, handing over to 23.11.

section.title: Highlights
section.para: In addition to numerous new and upgraded packages, this release has the following highlights:

listitem.para: NixOS now uses systemd-networkd as its default networking backend. With networkd, many network configurations which previously required use of can be expressed declaratively. Networkd’s connection management is also significantly more reliable than the scripted networking implementation previously in use by default. If you wish to continue using scripted networking, set to false.
